evidence.claim: Texas Medical Center employs AWS Lambda for serverless computing solutions.
The innovation factory uses FHIR standards for interoperability in healthcare applications.
They ensure HIPAA compliance in their cloud deployments which highlights adherence to health regulations.
Integration with HL7 messaging for electronic health record systems is part of their architecture.
Use of Google Cloud for data storage and processing is detailed on their platform documentation.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of engagement with X12 transactions or clearinghouse services found.
